
1.0.1 / 2014-09-18
==================

 * since moment().add(period, number) is deprecated from moment 2.8.x. update related code with moment().add(number, period), to avoid warning. (@threeday0905)

1.0.0 / 2014-09-15
==================

 * stream.end() should also clear the flush interval. (@threeday0905)

0.1.3 / 2014-07-08
==================

  * expose flush method

0.1.2 / 2014-07-08
==================

 * support encoding
 * ignore coveralls

0.1.1 / 2014-07-07
==================

 * add options.mkdir
 * use mkdirp to make sure dir exist
 * use autod
 * fix typo
 * add npm image

0.1.0 / 2013-11-08
==================

  * buffer flush log
  * support coveralls
  * use jscover
  * update logo url
  * add logo
